long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calofree is a free and open source browser extension to hide calorie information on websites.

It supports three different options to remove calorie information

The censor option replaces instances of of calorie information with the text "[hidden]".

The cover option replaces instances of calorie information with the text "[hidden]" but reveals it when hovered-over.

The delete option attempts to remove all traces of calorie information on web pages.

Feedback is always welcome, and feel free to share pages where the extension doesn't work as expected so I can continue to improve this extension.
